projects.title: ICOTL
projects.description: A dynamic website for the International Conference at MITS, built with React, Node.js, and Express.js for interactive online learning and event management.

projects.title: File Sharing App
projects.description: A file sharing web application built with the MERN stack, utilizing REST APIs to securely share files across a network. Emphasizes ease of use, modern JavaScript interface, and robust security for file transfers.

projects.title: HOPIRE Tech Solutions LLP
projects.description: A responsive startup landing page built with Vite + React, featuring dynamic form   handling via EmailJS. Styled using CSS for clarity and performance. Developed to reflect brand identity and ensure smooth user experience across devices.

projects.title: GMOCS-2K25
projects.description: A full-featured event management platform for GMOCS-2K25, integrating a Django REST API backend for automation, secure data handling, and scalable operations. The frontend leverages React with Vite for fast, interactive user experiences, while real-time updates and admin tools streamline event coordination.

projects.title: Green Valley School
projects.description: A modular school site created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring sections for students, teachers, and events. Prioritizes intuitive navigation and expandable structure.

projects.title: Ashv 2k25
projects.description: A sleek event management platform for Ashv-2k25, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Includes schedules and registration forms, designed for modern engagement and usability.

projects.title: FreshersDay 2k24
projects.description: A dedicated site for Freshers Day 2k24. Supports schedules, event details, and registration. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a modern user experience.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: A weather dashboard displaying real-time conditions and forecasts using weather APIs, with local storage management for user preferences and recent searches via JavaScript.

projects.title: My Portfolio
projects.description: A responsive portfolio showcasing skills, projects, and experiences. Built with JavaScript for fast performance, featuring modern design, smooth animations, and optimized asset loading.

projects.title: MITS Foundation
projects.description: A responsive website for MITS Foundation built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Highlights events, provides contact options, and ensures accessibility across devices with a clean, user-focused UI.

projects.title: Innospark 2k24
projects.description: A comprehensive platform for MITS Hackathon 2k24, enabling seamless team registration, real-time event updates, result announcements, and interactive schedules. Built for scalability and user engagement with a modern, responsive UI.

projects.title: Collage Event Manager
projects.description: A platform for managing college events. Includes event creation, registration, and management features. Built with Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB for backend functionality, and HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the frontend.

projects.title: Flex
projects.description: A student performance tracking system that uses the LeetCode API to fetch and display coding progress and statistics based on username. Integrates web and Python technologies for dynamic layouts, scripting utilities, and real-time data visualization.

projects.title: HopireK
projects.description: An ERP platform for Hopire Tech, built with Django for the backend and React for the frontend. Supports comprehensive business process management, secure data handling, and a modern, responsive user interface.
